Package checkers

Class Summary
AI Creates a computer "AI" to play against the player.
BlackChecker Creates a standard blackChecker piece to be used in the grid.
ButtonListener This class is an umbrella class that handles all events involving buttons clicked.
Grid Grid class, creates a two dimensional array of type "piece" Also performs functions to update, check validity etc.
GUI Creates a Graphical User Interface to play the game on.
InvalidMove Creates an Invalid move Dialog box which is used to inform the user, that he/she is an idiot and should learn to play checkers :).
King Piece that implements Kings in checkers programs.
Location A Location object represents the row and column of a location in a two-dimensional grid.
Move Move class packages a single "Move" in checkers.
Node<E,F> This is a class to implement tree structures within a java background.
Piece Standard Piece class for this program.
Player Player class to get and analyze moves from the player.
RedChecker Standard redChecker class for this program.
